compounddef.title: Team: Jeremy Udis, Drew Meyers, James Draper

detaileddescription.para: AQIQ bridges the gap between citizens and scientists by providing communities with low-cost air quality data analysis tools.
Our goal was to test the login credentials in order to see if the user entered valid input in order to register at our site. You can find the test cases here

entry.para: Provide an appealing Visualization for air quality data gathered by an Arduino
User is logged in, and uploads a .csv file with the correct header format
User does not leave the page or log out. User data is formatted to make a visualization
Up to user->Good idea to gather significant data prior

detaileddescription.para: |Actor Action|System Response|Comments| -----------------------------|:--------------------------------------:|:---------------------------:| |1.Register for a account|Won't know until login| |2.Login with email+password|Take user to the home page| |3.Upload a formatted.csv file|Inform user if .csv is formatted correctly|must be .csv w/ right formatting |4.View visualization|Display visualization
